verses.verse: בְּצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> went out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> When Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob מֵעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> from a people לֹעֵֽז׃ <S%H3937><s%> of strange language
הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> became יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לְקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> was his sanctuary יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> [and] Israel מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4475><s%> his dominion
הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> The sea רָ֭אָה <S%H7200><s%> saw וַיָּנֹ֑ס <S%H5127><s%> [it] and fled הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יִסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> was driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> back

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> The mountains רָקְד֣וּ <S%H7540><s%> skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> [and] the little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> cattle

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לְּךָ֣ הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> What [ailed] thee O thou sea כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תָנ֑וּס <S%H5127><s%> that thou fleddest הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> ? thou Jordan תִּסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> [that] thou wast driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> O

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> Ye mountains תִּרְקְד֣וּ <S%H7540><s%> [that] ye skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> [and] ye little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> cattle

מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אָ֭דוֹן <S%H113><s%> of the Lord ח֣וּלִי <S%H2342><s%> Tremble אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thou earth מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

הַהֹפְכִ֣י <S%H2015><s%> Which turned הַצּ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> the rock אֲגַם־ <S%H98><s%> [into] a standing מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ <S%H2496><s%> the flint לְמַעְיְנוֹ־ <S%H4599><s%> into a fountain מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of waters
